extracted_entities.name: JSS Special Issue on “Intelligent DevOps for Performance, Sustainability, and Reliability”

details.description: This special issue aims to consolidate the latest research and advancements on the topic of Intelligent DevOps for performance, sustainability, and reliability. It targets various sub-topics related to DevOps practices and their impact on software quality.
relevant_sub_topics: Observability and monitoring in DevOps pipelines
Application of AIOps techniques to support quality assurance
Automated anomaly detection, incident prediction, and root cause analysis
Data-driven feedback loops for continuous improvement
Intelligent test automation and AI-driven defect prediction
Integration of AI and data analytics tools into CI/CD workflows
Infrastructure as code solutions with intelligent self-adaptation
Automation in DevOps processes with large language models
Software architecture informed by operational data
Comparative evaluations of quality assurance methodologies

editors.name: Weiyi Shang
editors.affiliation: University of Waterloo, Waterloo Ontario, Canada
